story: You come across a group of cyborgs working on an experimental project, but they seem agitated and defensive. What do you do?

actions.action: Approach the cyborgs peacefully and inquire about their project
actions.good: After explaining your intentions, the cyborgs recognize your harmless nature and offer you a peek at the revolutionary technology they've been working on. As a reward for your kindness, they gift you with an advanced cybernetic implant.
actions.bad: As you approach the cyborgs, they mistake your intentions and attack. You take damage from their advanced weaponry, but manage to escape before they can do any serious harm.

actions.action: Attempt to steal the experimental project
actions.good: With your stealthy skills, you slip past the cyborgs undetected and sneak into their secure facility. You successfully pilfer the coveted technology and make a quick escape, but not before leaving a trail of advanced cybernetic implants as distractors.
actions.bad: As you attempt to steal the experimental project, an alarm blares and cyborgs pour out of every corner. You take heavy damage from their retaliation, barely making it out alive.

actions.action: Ignore them completely and move on
actions.good: You sense that there's something off about the cyborgs and wisely decide to keep your distance. As you continue your exploration, you come across a cache of advanced cybernetic implants, left behind by the skittish group.
actions.bad: As you pass by the cyborgs, they mistake your lack of interaction as aggression and lunge at you. You take damage from their surprise attack but manage to fend them off.
